Pre-Game Insights: India will lock horns against their arch-rivals Pakistan at Dubai International Cricket Stadium in the ICC T20 World Cup on Sunday.
India vs Pakistan game is always a high-pressure game, as all players carry the burden of their respective nation’s hopes on their shoulders.
So far in the ICC World cup, India has an undefeated streak against Pakistan.
Both teams come into the match with decent practice under their belt, having played two practice matches each.
India won both their warm-up matches, beating England and Australia.
Pakistan defeated West Indies by seven wickets and lost to South Africa.
Both the teams have the lethal bowling attack in T20 cricket.
The pitch in Dubai has been excellent for batting, but in the last few IPL matches, the track is slowing down slightly as the game progresses.
In the recently concluded IPL, nine out of 12 matches have been won by the chasing teams.
Head-to-Head (in ICC T20 World Cup): India – 5, Pakistan – 0.

Predicted Playing XI for India: KL Rahul, Rohit Sharma, Virat Kohli (c), Suryakumar Yadav, Rishabh Pant (wk), Hardik Pandya, Ravindra Jadeja, Shardul Thakur, Ravichandran Ashwin/Varun Chakravarthy, Jasprit Bumrah, Mohammad Shami.
Predicted Playing XI for Pakistan: Mohammad Rizwan (wk), Babar Azam (c), Fakhar Zaman, Mohammad Hafeez, Shoaib Malik, Asif Ali, Hasan Ali, Shadab Khan, Imad Wasim, Shaheen Afridi, Haris Rauf.
Key Players for India: Jasprit Bumrah, KL Rahul, Varun Chakravarthy, Surya Kumar Yadav.
Key Players for Pakistan: Babar Azam, Mohammad Rizwan, Shaheen Shah Afridi, Mohammad Hafeez.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Match Details: India vs Pakistan, Date: 24th October 2021, Time: 19:30 IST  14:00 GMT  20:00 local, Venue: Dubai International Cricket Stadium.
Record of chasing teams: Won – 9, Lost – 3, Tied – 0.
